import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import './ManageEstimate.css'; import Navbar from './Navbar'; import Footer from './Footer'; const ManageEstimate = () => { const [estimates, setEstimates] = useState([]); const [groups, setGroups] = useState([]); const [brands, setBrands] = useState([]); const [chains, setChains] = useState([]); const [zones, setZones] = useState([]); const [selectedGroup, setSelectedGroup] = useState(''); const [selectedBrand, setSelectedBrand] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:8080/estimate/all') .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => setEstimates(data)) .catch((error) => console.error('Error fetching estimates:', error)); fetch('http://localhost:8080/groups/allgroups') .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => setGroups(data)) .catch((err) => console.error('Groups Error:', err)); fetch('http://localhost:8080/brands/allbrand') .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => setBrands(data)) .catch((err) => console.error('Brands Error:', err)); fetch('http://localhost:8080/chains/allcompany') .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => setChains(data)) .catch((err) => console.error('Chains Error:', err)); fetch('http://localhost:8080/zones/allzones') .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => setZones(data)) .catch((err) => console.error('Zones Error:', err)); }, []); const filteredEstimates = estimates.filter((estimate) => { const matchGroup = selectedGroup ? estimate.chain.group.group_name === selectedGroup : true; const matchBrand = selectedBrand ? estimate.brandName === selectedBrand : true; return matchGroup && matchBrand; }); return (

Estimate Management

Create Estimate
{filteredEstimates.map((estimate, index) => ( ))}

{index + 1} {estimate.chain.group.group_name} {estimate.chain.chain_id} {estimate.brandName} {estimate.zoneName} {estimate.service} {estimate.quantity} {estimate.costPerUnit} {estimate.totalCost}
{/* Create Estimate Panel */}

{/* Edit Estimate Panel */}
Edit Estimate
); }; export default ManageEstimate;
